Join us on Nov. 20 to discuss actions we can take together as we plan and prepare for the 2020 election.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

We're hosting a party to watch the Democratic Presidential debates on Wednesday, November 20, and you are invited!

We will play debate Bingo and other debate-related games to make this momentous event as fun as possible. Of course, we'll have food and drink as well.

Democratic Presidential
Debate Watch Party

Wednesday, November 20, 7 p.m.
ACLU of Georgia office
1100 Spring St. NW, Suite 640
Atlanta, GA 30309

RSVP TODAY

Lastly, we'll talk about actions we can take together as we plan and prepare for the 2020 election that is now less than 12 months away. In fact, Georgia's presidential primary is Tuesday, March 24. Join us on Wednesday, November 20!

We look forward to seeing you at the debate watching party!

Christopher Bruce, Esq.
Political Director, ACLU of Georgia
